snippet: The world sailor of the year Iker Martinez became the second skipper in 22 years to win the first three legs of the Volvo Ocean Race.
abstract: Iker Martinez, world sailor of the year and skipper of Spain's Team Telefonica, becomes the second skipper in 22 years to win the first three legs of the Volvo Ocean Race.
lead_paragraph: The world sailor of the year Iker Martinez became the second skipper in 22 years to win the first three legs of the Volvo Ocean Race.
